name: Generalized Rotational Objects Library
short_description: Library libgro is intended for creation of Generalized Rotational Objects (GRO). GROs are fancy three-dee objects, that can be modelled easily, but they does not look siple. Want to model CRT-tube or wittch's hat in a moment? Try GRO!
